<NEW>

There was a nod from WHEELIE as RODIMUS was made to lay=
 down and he walked out.  For this moment, his options were limited.  He co=
uld not leave Rodimus, and without further assistance he could not contact =
the MAXIMALS due to the jamming field that was covering the entire basin an=
d area.

At this point, he also could not ask those who lived here for furt=
her help, not wanting to risk them being a target or making them take sides=
 over in this war.

And also getting the 'suggestio' over from UNUS over to=
wards RODIMUS, wondering just why they were so strongly but keeping quiet a=
s he spoke to RODIMUS, "Yes, rest.  Your friends will be around soon.  Don'=
t succumb to gloom and doom."

Waiting for UNUS to tell him where to go now=
, not wanting to do anything aggressive, and filing away the information on=
 SABERBACK and MAGMATRON to tell them as soon as he could, as well as a pos=
sible third army, and an outpost of escaped neutrals.
